Before You Buy â€“ Please Read!

Realife Simulator is not a movie. Itâ€™s not GTA, not The Sims, and not a quest-based adventure. Itâ€™s a sandbox â€“ a living world where you do whatever you want, if you want.

There are no pop-up missions, no â€œYou must go here!â€ arrows, and nobody is coming to entertain you.
Your experience is what you make of it. Some players love freedom, others need goals. Be honest with yourself!

Is This Game For You?

  • Do you love experimenting, exploring, and creating your own fun? Youâ€™ll feel at home here.

  • Do you want to just relax, try things out, or roleplay? This is your sandbox.

  • BUT, if youâ€™re looking for a guided adventure, constant objectives, or high-action storyâ€¦
    Sorry, this isnâ€™t it. Please watch gameplay before buying!

Common Questions:

  • â€œWhat do I do in this game?â€

    Whatever you want. Thatâ€™s the point. You create your story.

  • â€œIs there a main quest or ending?â€

    Nope! The game is open-ended, just like real life.

What does this mean?

  • You decide what to do: There are countless possibilities, but no one will tell you what your goal should be.

  • Create your own story: The world is a sandbox. Build, explore, roleplay, make friends or just relax.

  • No forced fun: If you want constant action, guided objectives, or cinematic missions, this game is not for you.

  • You make your own fun: The experience is what you make of it.

Before you buy:

  • This game is about player freedom and emergent gameplay.

  • If you enjoy experimenting, exploring, and creating your own goals, youâ€™ll love Realife Simulator.

  • If you expect story-driven progression or instant action, you may be disappointed.

  • Please check system requirements and gameplay videos before purchasing.

Why do we write this?

Many refund requests are from players expecting a traditional game structure. Realife Simulator is an open sandboxÂ  your imagination and creativity matter here!

Realife Simulator is more than just a game â€” it is an opportunity to step into a parallel life, one that reflects the complexity, freedom, and realism of modern society. Every decision you make, every action you take, and every role you adopt, echoes through a fully connected, multiplayer city that never sleeps.

Welcome to a place where there are no scripted characters.
No pre-written destinies.
Only real people â€” building real lives.

Like a real city...

A world where everyone has their own story, but where paths intersect.

Realife Simulator is not a simulation universe for a single player, but one where thousands of people live together.

You are not alone here. You never were.

The person passing by you is not a random NPC â€” they are a real player.

The employee you see at the market was someone else's boss an hour ago.

The man you pass on the street might arrest you an hour later.

Everyone here lives their own life.

But we all live in the same city.

ğŸŒ† Everyone is here, anything is possible

This city wasn't designed for just one person.

It's an open, dynamic system created by people living in real time.

Some go to work in the morning

Some go out into the streets at night

Some earn money through legal means

Some push the system in dark corners

Some buy the house of their dreams

Some canâ€™t pay the rent and end up sleeping on the streets

And sometimes, they all intersect in the same place.

Everyone has a role here.

But no one's â€œfateâ€ is predetermined.

ğŸ› ï¸ DEVELOPER'S NOTE

Hello,

As I write these lines, you may have just discovered the game, or you may have already started exploring its streets.

Realife Simulator wasn't born from a single idea.

It was created from games, life, observations, and sometimes just phrases that popped into my head in the middle of the night.

My goal wasnâ€™t to create a game that mimics real life.

It was to build a system deep enough to handle life like a game.

We wanted to create a world where not only characters but also decisions come to life.

A structure where itâ€™s not just about the choices you make, but where those choices shape you.

This project isnâ€™t shaped by a large team, but by a passionate vision.

There may be gaps along the way. There might even be mistakes.

But I can guarantee one thing:

Weâ€™ll keep growing this world together with you.

Your opinions, critiques, even the smallest idea can change the direction of this project.

Realife Simulator could be much more than just a game.

What it becomesâ€”just like the game itselfâ€”is up to you.

Thank you.

Welcome to reality.
